MAIN.PHRASE: Fashion has to reflect who you are, what you feel at the moment and where you're going - Pharrell Williams
MAIN.INFO: I'm Irina de la Morena, a stylist, fashion consultant and digital creator at @styledbyirina. Currently, I am 21 years old, but I have been passionate about fashion since I can remember, for this reason I have focused my studies on it. In 2021 I got my degree in Personal and Corporate Image Consulting in Barcelona, my hometown, but I have been working as a stylist for three years now.
MAIN.SERVICES: Click here to discover the 6 services available, their characteristics, what they include, the reason for each one and their cost. All are personalized and are available in Spanish and English.
MAIN.LINKS: Click here to access the direct links of all the clothes published in @styledbyirina. This way you can recreate the outfits.
MAIN.ABOUT_ME: Here you will find a short description about who I am, why I believe in @styledbyirina and what my values are as a brand and as a person.

SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: All the services in @styledbyirina are personalized, since we all have different needs. If you need any other service not listed here, feel free to send me an email.
SERVICES.SERVICE_IN_ENGLISH_SPANISH: Service available in both English and Spanish

PORTFOLIO_DESC: Here you can see some of my works in the past three years. These looks were designed for photoshoots or for a day to day basis

FORMS.NAME: Name:
FORMS.REQUEST_SENT: Request sent! I'll answer as soon as possible

ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: I'm Irina de la Morena, a stylist, fashion consultant and digital creator at @styledbyirina. Currently, I am 21 years old, but I have been passionate about fashion since I can remember, for this reason I have focused my studies on it. In 2021 I got my degree in Personal and Corporate Image Consulting in Barcelona, my hometown, but I have been working as a stylist for three years now.
ABOUT_ME.EXPERIENCE: Two years of experience in the fashion industry
ABOUT_ME.INTEREST: I've loved fashion for as long as I can remember
ABOUT_ME.VALUES_INFO: The values I want to convey in @styledbyirina are:
ABOUT_ME.VALUES_SUMMARY: Without any doubt, these are the 6 most important values for me, thanks to them I have been growing as a person and as a professional.
ABOUT_ME.HISTORY: I created @styledbyirina about three years ago, my main motivation was to express myself and show the public my way of seeing life through fashion. Little by little the account started growing, I focused the content on helping and inspiring All people who see the posts and thanks to that today we are more than 100k on Instagram. I also like to inform about the novelties in this sector, whether it is new collections, collaborations or cover the fashion weeks at national and international level.
